text: Sonny Allen (March 8, 1936 â€“ September 11, 2020) was an American college basketball coach. He was the head coach at Old Dominion University from 1965 to 1975. He later coached Southern Methodist University during the 1975-76 until the 1979-80 seasons. He then coached the University of Nevada, Reno from 1980 to 1987. Allen was born in Moundsville, West Virginia. Allen died on September 11, 2020 in Reno, Nevada from Parkinson's disease, aged 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:College basketball coaches Category:Sportspeople from West Virginia Category:Sportspeople from Nevada Category:People from Reno, Nevada
title: Sonny Allen
